"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a9e195636872217be50600#post_54a9e195636872217be50600
3 out of the 3 teams I have rooted for have lost so far: the Cardinals, the Steelers, and now the Lions

I didn't care either way for the Bengals vs Colts so I'm neutral towards the Colts victory

But now all I can hope for is the Patriots beating the Ravens, the Seahawks beating the Panthers, the Cowboys beating the Packers, and... whoever wins between the Broncos and the Colts, I'm neutral for that game too.
